“alla” namathi wachanaya bhawitha kirimata ayithiya aththe ka hata da yana matha bhedaya uda wiwidha jathin gen saha wiwidha aagam walin samanwitha malesiyanu samajaye samagiya bindi yame tharjanayakata lak wi thibe.me matha gatuma padaka kota gena wirodhatha saha udghoshanaya kirim kalaka patan sidu wemin pawathi athara ehi prathipalayak lesa malesiyawa pura athi “alla” namathi wachanaya adangu kristhiyani handa pata saha thati siyalla wasara hayakata pera eewa aanayanaya kirimata katayuthu kala kanthawa wetha ma aapasu yawiya yuthu bawata malesiyawe adhikaranayak niyoga kaleya.kithunuwanta waradilada?kwalalampur wala athi shabdagarayaka patigatha kirimaka yedi sitiyadi hamuwu ekthara sangitha kandayamakata ayath samajikayan didulana nawina widuli gitarayan wayamin gayamin sitiye alla dewiyan ge iganwim pilibandawayi.ee atharin keneku wu nasri aliyas pawasuwe “alla” namathi wachanaye ayithiya islam bhakthikayan sathu wiya yuthu bawayi.“male bhashawe alla kiyana wachanaya yodanne islam dewiyan handunwanna.
